title: Physics
description: Defines the physical properties of an actor, including whether it is affected by gravity, whether it collides with objects, or whether it is pushed to the closest space.

has_collision.description: Whether or not the entity collides with things.
has_collision.title: Has Collision

has_gravity.description: Whether or not the entity is affected by gravity.
has_gravity.title: Has Gravity

push_towards_closest_space.description: Whether or not the entity is pushed to the closest space.
push_towards_closest_space.title: Pushed Towards Closest Space
